text: Choi Min (born Choi Min-Sung on January 1, 1987) is a South Korean actor. He is best known for his roles in My Bittersweet Life, My Dear Cat, and Cinderella with Four Knights. == Filmography == === Films === {| class="wikitable" ! Year ! Title !
